oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Armstrong, Virginia Bell, 1912 January 25
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of Virginia Bell Armstrong, dated September 1st, 1907. Illustrates the first page of the document. Armstrong’s will was presented for probate to the Davidson County Court during the January Term, 1912. An envelope is addressed to “Mrs. V. B. Armstrong, McHenry, Miss[issippi]. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Armstrong family
